pros:
Get to learn the value of life meeting with refugees 
Get to learn about people's life and their difficulties
cons: Have to hear a lot of sad events that happened to real people

review_title: It is  a great  work for people who love to help other people.
job_title: Protection Assistant in Mae Hong Son
pros: It is a great happiness when you can help some people to get a better life or to safe someone's life.
cons: It could be very stressful to work and live in a remote area without any entertaining places that we used to i.e. cinema, shopping malls, etc. Due to limitations, it always happened that we cannot find the best solutions for refugees and it can be depressed and sad.
